column6: 15 homeless people sleeping along the riverbanks
column7: public gardens and outside residences around the riverside were sent by the Daun Penh administration to the Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation Departments of Phnom Penh.------Daun Penh Administration gathered a total of 15 people
column8: including 7 women and 2 children and were sent away for ‘education’ and training. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/303113
